Interviewed analysts on preferred release cadence dashboards.

experiments.title: Shot quality heatmap
experiments.summary: Blend player-tracking XY coordinates with defender proximity to surface expected shot value by zone.
objectives: Calibrate accuracy with last-two-minute possession samples.
Stress test against 2024-25 schedule density for caching strategy.

experiments.title: Win probability narrations
experiments.summary: Pair auto-generated story captions with live win probability charts to explain momentum swings without manual scripting.
objectives: Validate caption tone against broadcast guidelines.
Expose instrumentation hook for real-time updates.

experiments.title: Fan sentiment index
experiments.summary: Scrape social channels and encode emotions into a gameday hype gauge that updates hourly.
objectives: Establish moderation thresholds for raw text ingestion.
Prototype emoji-to-sentiment mapping for rapid visual cues.

experiments.title: Trade simulator
experiments.summary: Model cap mechanics, draft pick value, and culture fit before proposals go public.
objectives: Define compatibility scoring for multi-team scenarios.
Outline salary-matching validation and trade rules.
